name: Gerard Dacudao
text: Nathanael , indeed, let us not crumble at the end.  The tragedy of Luna is the same old Filipino tendency of organizing, mobilizing, then crumbling at the end.  In my view, Du30 is a rare invention that I dare say will trump Marcos.  How?  In the 20 years of Duterte rule of Davao, he did not steal at all.  And he is now 70 years old.  Marcos was 48 when he got in power.  Du30 is our last hope.  Lets rally for the best shot we have!
